prompt: Create a forgot password screen with neumorphic design and light gray background. Use Column layout with crossAxisAlignment.stretch. Display black 'Password Reset' title, font size 30, bold. Add gray subtitle saying 'Enter your email for a reset link.' Include TextField with neumorphic shadow (BoxShadow with blurRadius 4 and offset), white background, 'Email' hint text, and gray email prefix icon. Use full-width ElevatedButton with subtle gray background, black 'Send' text, and neumorphic shadow. Place gray 'Back to Login' TextButton below. Use 24px padding and 20px spacing between elements.
